infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: DwellTime needs your location to detect when you arrive at facilities and track detention time.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: DwellTime needs background location access to continue tracking detention time when the app is in the background.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: DwellTime uses your location to track detention time at facilities, even when the app is closed.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: DwellTime uses your camera to capture photos of dock conditions, BOLs, and check-in documentation.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: DwellTime needs access to your photo library to attach existing photos as evidence.
